Translations.Text: ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu harridi-lmu'minine `ale-lkital. iy yekum minkum `isrune sabirune yaglibu mieteyn. veiy yekum minkum mietuy yaglibu elfem mine-llezine keferu biennehum kavmul la yefkahun
el'ane haffefe-llahu `ankum ve`alime enne fikum da`fa. feiy yekum minkum mietun sabiratuy yaglibu mieteyn. veiy yekum minkum elfuy yaglibu elfeyni biizni-llah. vellahu me`a-ssabirin
ma kane linebiyyin ey yekune lehu esra hatta yushine fi-l'ard. turidune `arada-ddunya. vellahu yuridu-l'ahirah. vellahu `azizun hakim
levla kitabum mine-llahi sebeka lemessekum fima ehaztum `azabun `azim
fekulu mimma ganimtum halalen tayyiba. vetteku-llah. inne-llahe gafurur rahim
